activities.name: Tower of London
activities.text: Explore the historic Tower of London.

activities.name: British Museum
activities.text: Visit the British Museum and see its vast collection.

activities.name: Panama Canal
activities.text: Experience the engineering marvel of the Panama Canal.

activities.name: Wine Tasting in Maipu Valley
activities.text: Indulge in wine tasting in Maipu Valley.

activities.name: Tokyo Skytree
activities.text: Visit the Tokyo Skytree for panoramic views of the city.

activities.name: Meiji Shrine
activities.text: Experience the tranquility of Meiji Shrine.

activities.name: Great Wall of China
activities.text: Walk along the majestic Great Wall of China.

activities.name: Sagrada Familia
activities.text: Admire the architectural masterpiece of Sagrada Familia.

activities.name: Park Güell
activities.text: Stroll through the whimsical Park Güell.

activities.name: Anne Frank House
activities.text: Learn about Anne Frank's life at her former hiding place.

activities.name: Vatican City
activities.text: Explore the Vatican City and its world-famous museums.

activities.name: Colosseum
activities.text: Visit the iconic Colosseum of Rome.

activities.name: Christ the Redeemer
activities.text: Marvel at the statue of Christ the Redeemer.

activities.name: Tivoli Gardens
activities.text: Enjoy the enchanting Tivoli Gardens.

activities.name: Hagia Sophia
activities.text: Visit the magnificent Hagia Sophia.

activities.name: Blue Mosque
activities.text: Admire the stunning architecture of the Blue Mosque.

activities.name: Sydney Opera House
activities.text: Experience a performance at the Sydney Opera House.

activities.name: Bondi Beach
activities.text: Relax and surf at the famous Bondi Beach.

activities.name: Palacio de Bellas Artes
activities.text: Admire the stunning architecture of Palacio de Bellas Artes.

activities.name: Teotihuacan
activities.text: Explore the ancient city of Teotihuacan.

activities.name: Machu Picchu
activities.text: Discover the awe-inspiring ruins of Machu Picchu.

activities.name: Table Mountain
activities.text: Take a cable car up Table Mountain for breathtaking views.

activities.name: Cape of Good Hope
activities.text: Visit the iconic Cape of Good Hope.
